channel.title: Jimi Hendrix tab book
channel.description:
I'm looking for a quality book containing tablature of Jimi Hendrix' music.
[url=https://www.amazon.co.uk/Jimi-Hendrix-Leonard-Publishing-Corporation/dp/0793533856/ref=sr_1_30?ie=UTF8&s=books&qid=1271716956&sr=1-30]This[/url] seems like a good buy, but I'm not sure if it's any good.
Does anyone know of a good one?

item.title: Jimi Hendrix tab book
item.dc:creator: bur
item.description:
It was a birthday gift from my sister, I just had to choose which one I wanted. According to reviews I’ve looked up, this one, which is the one I bought, is quite accurate anyway. And it’s always handy to have it on paper instead of on screen.

Read full topic

item.title: Jimi Hendrix tab book
item.dc:creator: TurbulentSOlace
item.description:
Burbinator:

I’m looking for a quality book containing tablature of Jimi Hendrix’ music.

This seems like a good buy, but I’m not sure if it’s any good.

Does anyone know of a good one?

Why purchase tab books when you can easily obtain free tabs which are much more accurate? If you haven’t already, check out the tabs on https://www.powertabs.net . Although you’ll need the power tab editor (it’s free and quite useful) to view them, they’re certainly the most accurate tabs that I’ve ever seen, and they make commercial ones seem like a joke.

Read full topic
